plot: Six people reunite to remember beautiful Rosemary Barton, who died nearly a year before. The loving sister, the long-suffering husband, the devoted secretary, the lovers, the betrayed wife - none of them can forget Rosemary. But did one of them murder her? Titled in America Remembered Death.Narrated by Hugh Fraser
characters: Colonel Race, George Barton, Iris Marle, Ruth Lessing
